description: Write a function that checks if an IPv4 `ip_str` falls within any of the `private_ranges`. `private_ranges` is a NULL-terminated array of CIDR strings. Example (Blocked): is_ip_in_ranges("10.0.0.1", ["10.0.0.0/8", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Public): is_ip_in_ranges("8.8.8.8", ["10.0.0.0/8", NULL]) -> 0.
